text:
Feeling a bit cold?
Let me check the air conditioning remote...

Oh, I'm fine.
Thank you for your concern.

Then, let's
keep it as it is...

Your thoughtfulness is greatly appreciated.
But please don't hesitate to speak up if it gets too hot.

Yes...! 
t was just a little tickle in my nose...

Well,
I wanted to talk about something...

If you're not feeling well,
don't hesitate to say so.

Hehe, thank you.
I'll definitely do that when the time comes, okay?
